metadata.title: CVE-2021-47041 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nvmet-tcp: fix incorrect locking in state_change sk callback We are notchanging anything in the TCP connection state so we should not take awrite_lock but rather a read lock. This caused a deadlock when runningnvmet-tcp and nvme-tcp on the same system, where state_change callbacks onthe host and on the controller side have causal relationship and madelockdep report on this
